website_summaries.verdict: The LSTN Bowerys earphones deliver deep bass at a low price, but they can sometimes sound muddy.
pros: Inline remote control and microphone for mobile devices
Handsome design features real, reclaimed wood

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product, beautifully made with a great sound
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, beautifully made with a great sound. I'd have gladly given it five stars if they'd have lasted longer than a week, but that wasn't the case. The right earpiece stopped working. I assume it was just a defective product. I have LSTN's Zebrawood Troubadors and they're still working very nicely, so I chalked it up to bad luck in my case and didn't bother raising a fuss. I'll be giving these another shot in the future, when I grow tired of my bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Horton

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazing product, value for price
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product, value for price. The bass is amazing and sound is super loud, crisp and clear. Also, I have been stopped twice by people to compliment how it looks! Totally mind blown!
customer_reviews.author: Shrijesh Siwakoti

customer_reviews.title: Great price too
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves them! I even tried them out and was impressed with how well the quality was and how much noise cancellation it has! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and they are comfortable to wear. Also, the cord doesn't tangle as easily as some do.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy M.

customer_reviews.title: I received these headphones yesterday - they worked for approximately ...
customer_reviews.text: I received these headphones yesterday - they worked for approximately an hour then the right earbud went completely dead and the left was very muted. I also don't think they're real wood. There are tiny little chips in the coating and it appears to be plastic underneath. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing detail.
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say when the Bowers burn in you are in for a ear orgasm. Amazing detail.
customer_reviews.author: fela is the man

customer_reviews.title: he loves them great buy. And out standing sound and the item ...
customer_reviews.text: bought them for a xmas gift for husband, he loves them great buy. And out standing sound and the item is very handsome and sylish
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great head phones, work well. Awesome story behind them as well. Was here within a week after order.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I was given a pair originally by a friend and really enjoyed the quality of sound and the degree of noise cancellation that they provide. So I decided to buy a pair for my roommate and she loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Leatrice McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Annoying Thumping Sound From Movement
customer_reviews.text: I have these headphones in cherry with the nylon chord. The sound quality is great. Detailed high frequencies and nice bass. However, I noticed an extreme amount of noise while wearing the earbuds anytime the cable is handled, rubbed on my clothes. If I tap the cable with my fingers I can hear a thump thump noise. It's extremely annoying and a deal breaker for me. I don't recommend these at all unless you are paralyzed from the neck down since you won't have the ability to move and thus create the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny C

customer_reviews.title: Loved these, but they don't last
customer_reviews.text: I received these as part of a Quarterly.co shipment from Tim Ferriss. They soon became my everyday headphones. I love the design, the sound quality, and they seemed like a really durable piece of equipment. I've had mine for a little less than a year now but the left earphone stopped working. I noticed I get some scratchy feedback now if I move the cord a bit, but it looks like they are done for good. I think if LSTN makes some quality adjustments they would have a fine piece on their hands. But this one didn't make it on the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Drew B.

customer_reviews.title: but I contacted LSTN and their customer service was wonderful - they replaced the defective pair immediately
customer_reviews.text: My first pair stopped working after about four months - one of the earbuds just cut out sound. That would have lost it a star, but I contacted LSTN and their customer service was wonderful - they replaced the defective pair immediately, since it was within warranty, and the current pair still works. So they get the star back! I love the quality of sound and the design of the earbuds themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Tanafon

customer_reviews.title: What a miss
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at an airport having broken my most recent pair of ear buds. The entire flight was spent messing with these trying to get them into my ear in such a way that fully created a seal, but didn't muffle the music. I tried every size bud, but couldn't get them to work without jamming my finger into it. The sound quality when not muffled was fine. I'm just glad United Airlines gave out Apple-esque ear buds that did me just fine.
customer_reviews.author: SomeCallMeDan

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I've been really pleased with the sound quality of these earbuds. I received them as a gift and they really sound good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chris

product_meta.title: LSTN Headphones LST8 Cherry Wood Bowery Earbuds with Mic
product_meta.description: Style:Bowery| Color:Cherry Wood| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingFor the fans of convenience and accessibility. The music lovers who never go a minute without their favorite tunes. The always-on-the-go-go-go types. For every pair sold, LSTN helps restore hearing to a person in need through Starkey Hearing Foundation. Each pair of LSTN Bowerys is individually handcrafted from real, reclaimed wood. No two pairs are the same and wood grain might vary from photos. Sound & purpose.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars24 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
